ARTICLE.TITLE: Assisted living center sued after fire code violations; owner feels 'unfairly' treated
ARTICLE.TEXT: The total cost of the project was slightly higher than the original Fire and Life Safety America quoted costs, Becerra said. He blames those higher costs on the fire marshal’s office, as he said he had the new vendor expedite the installation of the new sprinkler system.
